column1: # This file controls the frame rate for different targets.
# The frame rate is calculated as nframes = frameRateConstant * imageFraction
# so movie gets slower as get closer to the target - typically need to slow things
# The default frameRateConstant is set in config.frameRateConstant
# The values in this file override the default.
# The frame rate is kind of arbitrary - it depends on how rapidly pictures were taken.

column2: which controls the frame rate for each image
